title: StreamingX
description: Engineered a scalable video platform inspired by YouTube, enabling seamless streaming and rapid content delivery. Integrated advanced video processing (FFmpeg) and cloud-native architecture to support high user concurrency.
keyPoints: Led end-to-end development with Next.js and TypeScript
Implemented advanced video processing pipeline using FFmpeg and Cloudflare R2
Optimized for high concurrency and rapid video load times

title: Foodllowers
description: Developed a high-availability e-commerce platform serving 10,000+ concurrent users with real-time synchronization and seamless payment processing. Designed for reliability and business growth.
keyPoints: Handled 10k+ concurrent users with 0 downtime
Integrated MercadoPago for 99.9% payment success rate
Achieved real-time updates with <200ms latency

title: F-Kitchens
description: Built a real-time kitchen management system with enterprise-grade security, streamlining order processing and minimizing errors for food businesses.
keyPoints: Processed 500+ daily orders in real-time
Reduced order errors by 78% with robust validation systems
Maintained 99.95% system uptime SLA

title: F-Deliverys
description: Created a logistics optimization engine with automated CI/CD and real-time monitoring, accelerating deliveries and deployment cycles for business operations.
keyPoints: Optimized delivery routes for 30% faster deliveries
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 40%
Enabled real-time tracking with 98.7% accuracy

title: F-Influencers
description: Developed an influencer analytics platform with real-time dashboards and Agile workflows, empowering marketing teams with actionable insights and scalable data pipelines.
keyPoints: Delivered real-time sales analytics with <500ms data latency

Reduced payout processing errors by 78% through validation systems
Scaled data pipelines to handle 1.2M+ monthly events

title: Portfolio
description: Modern, high-performance portfolio built with Astro, React, and TypeScript. Optimized for UX, accessibility, and SEO to highlight engineering skills and personal brand.
keyPoints: Extreme optimization for speed and user experience

Responsive, accessible, and multi-language (EN/ES)
